cardContent.initHelperText: Here are some information of your application.

helperText.firstName: Enter your first name (It is at least 2 and not more than 15 characters long)
helperText.lastName: Enter your last name (It is at least 2 and not more than 15 characters long)
helperText.phone: Enter your phone (It is at least 7 and not more than 12 digits long)
helperText.Date of Birth: Enter your date of birth or select date from calendar pop-up and range of birth-year is from 1930 to 2020.

helperText.main: You must select main Subjects and Curriculum from selections given.
helperText.secondary: Select secondary Subjects and Curriculum from selections given.
